verbose_text: Spearman 's rank correlation analysis revealed that the protein expression of ATF3 and MMP2 positively correlated with the pathological grade of glioma (rho = 0.592, P < 0.01 and rho = 0.726, P < 0.01, respectively), while the protein expression of maspin negatively correlated with the pathological grade of glioma (rho = -0.517, P < 0.01).
